testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: Transforms need to work on boxes of generated content just as on any other boxes. This file tests a generated inline Box
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: Transforms need to work on boxes of generated content just as on any other boxes. This file tests a generated block Box
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This tests that a transform on the root element *does* affect the rendering of fixed backgrounds on its Descendants
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This tests that adding a rotation to a non-root element doesn't affect rendering of fixed backgrounds on its Descendants
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This affects that adding a no-op transform to an element with a fixed background doesn't affect rendering
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This is the same as transform-fixed-bg-002 except that we also test that a rotation on a non-root element doesn't affect fixed backgrounds
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This is the same as transform-fixed-bg-001 except that we also test that a rotation on a non-root element doesn't affect fixed backgrounds
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: we translate the div 150px down instead of 50px and also scroll down 100px. This should be the same as the previous test because the background image is 100px square
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: we have a div that's 100px square aligned at the top left of the page giving it a fixed background and translating it 50px down and right should be the same as giving it a non-fixed background that's translated 50px down and right
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: List-items are block-level elements so should transform the same as blocks
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: Inline-tables are atomic inline-level elements so should transform the same as blocks
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: Inline-blocks are block-level elements so should transform the same as blocks
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This just tests that a transform on a container div moves its contents not just the div itself
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: Inline-blocks are atomic inline-level elements so should transform the same as blocks
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: Tests that applying multiple transforms to an element is the same as applying the transforms in the same order to nested Elements
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This is exactly the same as transform-background-007.html except that the background is specified directly on the root element instead of being specified on the body and propagating to the Root
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: If the root element is transformed the transformation applies to the entire canvas including any background specified for the root element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: the transform is applied to the body element but the root element's background is transparent so the background is actually on the root element instead of the body
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: the scale is applied to the root element and the background is on the body
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This file tests that a transform on the parent works correctly not just on the element Itself
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: Background images 3 fall within the element's border box so they need to be transformed along with it
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: Background images 2 fall within the element's border box so they need to be transformed along with it
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: Background images 1 fall within the element's border box so they need to be transformed along with it
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: The 'transform' property does not apply to non-replaced inline elements
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: The 'transform' property applies to elements with 'display' set to 'block'
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This test differs from transform-abspos-002.html in that the outer div has display: inline-table which might cause it to render differently in buggy Uas
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This test differs from transform-abspos-001.html in that the outer div is a table which might cause buggy rendering engines to treat it differently
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: this test should be offset by one pixel from the Reference
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This test differs from transform-abspos-001.html in that it uses the right/bottom properties for positioning instead of top/left
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This test differs from the previous in that it uses right/bottom properties for positioning instead of left/top
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This means fixed-position elements need to be rooted at a transformed ancestor rather than the viewport
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: absolutely positioned elements need to be rooted at a transformed ancestor just as though it had non-static Position
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: The lime square in this test has a skew method applied : 30deg on x and 20deg on y. The red polygon should be totally hidden by the lime skewed square. Both start at 00
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: If zero value is passed to scale function it causes the element to disappear
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: If the second parameter of scale function is not provided it takes a value equal to the first. This transform causes the element to appear twice as long in both the X and Y axes
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: This test verifies that the CSS transform ends up in the list of SVG transforms
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: The transform scales the element to twice its size in both the X and Y directions and moves its origin to the top left corner
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: When the element is hovered over the transform scales the element to twice its size in both the X and Y directions and moves its origin to the top left corner
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: skew x axis by 25 degree y axis by 35 degree part 2
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: skew x axis by 25 degree y axis by 35 degree part 1
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: Child square element is transformed (scaled to zero) along with the parent element
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: box width and height will be twice larger if transform scale(2) applied 1
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: box width and height will be twice larger if transform scale(2) applied 2
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms

testcase.purpose: asserting that you can rotate an element with CSS
testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transforms
